_sText:
This is the third and (hopefully) final version of my debut surf map.
Basically it was an exercise for me to see what kind of detail fits certain settings,  as can be seen by the changing styles throughout the map.

Final!!
- Fixed teleporter at endzone not going anywhere.
- New spawn!!
- Fixed some lighting issues.
- Minor changes to the skybox.
- Lots more secrets, including two new mysterious controls in the top-of-jail area.

Beta 2!!

- Fixed problem getting out of smg area.
- Removed random spawns
- Removed ability to spawn jump
- Added nade spawners in jail
- Cubemaps now work
- One extra secret ;)

Enjoy :)
